title: Interpretation of a dream about a white dog according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about a white dog is one of the dreams that may appear to a person in his pajamas and make him happy throughout the dream, because the dog is one of the man’s pets and he searches for it often. White. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about seeing firewood in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a white dog by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin has provided a number of interpretations for this vision, which differ depending on what is seen, namely: If the vision is seeing a white dog in a dream only, but not The dog has a role in the dream, it means that it is characterized by loyalty and honesty, and also has a talent for a certain thing, but it does not. Knows. If the dream is to feed the white dog, it means that the opinion seeks to develop and grow its multiple talents. If the vision is to see only a white puppy, it means that the dreamer has the ability to take responsibility. If the white dog is sick in the dream, this It means that there is a friend whose point of view does not matter to him, or vice versa. Interpretation of seeing a white dog for a single woman in a dream. Scientists have interpreted this vision for an unmarried girl with different interpretations, namely: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that there is a white dog in her house that she takes care of and feeds, then this The dream means that there is an evil person who wants to deceive this girl, but God will side with this girl. . And keep this person away from her. If the dream is that there is a white dog standing far away, but this dog is wild, and the unmarried woman is afraid to approach it, then this means to her that this evil will find her, but God will keep her away from it. A white dog in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates a date Her marriage to a young man she loves, and God knows best. The girl’s dream may be that some bad friends will appear to her that she must stay away from. Interpretation of a dream about a white dog for a pregnant woman. In the interpretation of dreams, scientists have explained different interpretations of this dream for a pregnant woman, which are: If the dream is that the pregnant woman sees Her dream is that her son is playing with a white dog, this means for her that the pregnancy will be difficult, but the birth will be easy, God willing. If the dream was of a white wild dog in the pregnant woman’s house and she tried to get it out of the house and succeeded, this means for her that it will create some problems and disputes for her, But she will get rid of it. If the white dog is beautiful in the dream, calm and playing with the pregnant woman, this means that she will give birth to a boy. Beautiful. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bicycle in a dream Interpretation of seeing a white dog for young people. Scientists in the interpretation of dreams have mentioned different interpretations of this vision, Which may reach a young man’s dream, which is: If a young man wearing pajamas is playing with a wild and white dog, this means that there are some bad friends in his life and he must stay away from them. If the dream was that a friend brought a white dog to his house and this dog was wild and he took it out From home, it means that some bad things will happen and we have to pay attention to them. The young man in pajamas saw that there is a white dog running after him and trying to bite him, but the young man is running away from the dog means

title: Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea and dying

preview.html: First, conduct a series of research on the interpretations of his vision to find it, but here today we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream of a relative drowning, as well as the interpretation of a dream of a loved one drowning. One. The interpretation of the dream of drowning in the sea and surviving from it, and also the interpretation of the dream of a child drowning and his death from the website of the interpreter of dreams and visions and everything related to this vision accurately and without making any effort. The interpretation of the vision of drowning in the sea and death in a dream for an unmarried girl, if the unmarried woman sees herself in the middle of the sea water and does not You can escape from it. This indicates that the sign may face some problems in the coming period, but it will end. In the event that you see a member of your family or a relative standing in the middle of the water and unable to get out. This indicates that this person is actually in trouble. While If she saw in a dream that her brother was drowning. This is good news for her. She was told that she would get married soon. Whereas if she saw that her husband had died from drowning and was not spared. This may be a sign that she will face some problems in her next life, but they will end quickly. It is possible To see her drowning in the sea, and that the dreamer will enter into a romantic relationship with an unserious person. And if she is saved in a dream, this indicates her mood. See also: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing drowning in the sea and death in a dream for a married woman. It is possible that this indicates The vision indicates that the dreamer is unable to take care of his family and home. She may be ungrateful in dealing with her husband and only cares about herself. The previous vision may indicate that the fortuneteller may soon witness the death of one of her children if she does not start taking care of them. Her neglect may be a sign Warning for her husband not to separate from her and go to another woman who will take care of him. Seeing drowning could be a sign that the fortuneteller is taking care of her home. He is drowning in the sea of ​​responsibility and taking care of them only. In case the fortuneteller sees her daughter drowning in a dream. This indicates the need of that girl in reality. If he sees his daughter drowning in the water, this may indicate that his daughter is in a relationship with some girls who have bad friends. Therefore, she must be cared for and cared for. If He saw his brother drowning in a dream, then this vision may indicate that the dreamer’s brother has a real problem and he must take care of his brother. It is possible that the previous vision indicates that the brother is committing a lot of foolishness and sins at the present time that the visionary needs advice from. In the event that he sees A child he knows drowns in a dream. This vision can indicate that the dreamer will face many problems. It may indicate that he needs help. Read also: Interpretation of swimming in the sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of seeing drowning in the sea and death in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation in the event that the fortuneteller sees A child is drowning in a dream. This could be a warning about the fetus and that he needs to be careful. If she sees herself drowning in the pond in a dream. This could be an indication that the dreamer may face some troubles.

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a wedding dress in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: A wedding dress in a dream for a married woman. The wedding day is one of the special days in a girl’s life where her happiness is filled with joy and her hearts are filled with joy. The wedding dress is one of the special clothes as it sparkles and a special look that brings happiness to her heart. Seeing a girl’s wedding dress in a girl’s dream makes her feel happy and optimistic, and if the woman gets married and sees a wedding dress in her dream, she will feel joyful and confused at the same time and be amazed. About the interpretation of this dream. A wedding dress in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a married woman is that it symbolizes enjoying good health and a stable life full of happiness and peace. If a woman sees a dress of joy in her dream, and it is cut and dirty, this means that she has gone through a lot of worries and sorrows. If a lady desires to have children and sees a wedding dress in her dream, it means that God will conceive her and give birth to a good boy. The dream of a dreamer whose husband died wearing a dress of joy symbolizes her marriage again or providing peace and mental calm after a period of intense grief over the loss of her husband. The dreamer wears A tight white wedding dress, but she was able to wear it in the end, is a sign of a lot of pressure and difficulties, but she is doing her best to overcome them, but if the long dress indicates her longevity. Seeing a white wedding dress in a dream, and its material is cotton, means that the dreamer will collect a lot of currencies soon. Seeing an old married woman wearing a wedding dress symbolizes her good relationship and good treatment with everyone around her, including her family, neighbors, and relatives. It also indicates that the time of her departure from life is approaching, and may God have mercy on her. In the event that the woman did not have children before, and she saw in Her dream is that her husband gives her a dress of joy and she is wearing it, this symbolizes that God will carry her soon. The wedding dress in a dream for a married woman Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a wedding dress in a married woman’s dream as a sign of the many benefits available to her and the stability of her life circumstances. In the event that a woman wants to She begins investing in a new business or trade and sees a Farah dress in her dream. This symbolizes her success in her work, and earning a lot of profits, and may God bless her. It is possible that the wedding dress in the dreamer’s dream indicates the success and excellence of her children and their expectation of a bright future and indicates their upbringing and upbringing. Good news for performing their work and getting closer to God. Wearing a joyful dress in a woman’s dream and getting married again indicates the appearance of many good news that will change her life for the better and end all the sorrows she faced. Wedding dress in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream wearing a white wedding dress is a sign However, all the pain that you feel due to pregnancy has ended and the date of birth is approaching. The dress of joy in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes the birth of a child who will be good after his old age and will bring with him goodness and nourishment once he comes. The dress of joy in a dream, and its interpretation relates to the type of fetus that the dreamer desires If she wants to give birth to a male, she will be blessed with him

title: Interpretation of a dream about dancing at a wedding for an unmarried woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about dancing at a wedding for a single woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. It should be noted that dancing is a sign of joy and happiness that a person feels, as it has the same meaning in a dream and can be good news. For the pioneer, in addition, it can be a bad omen that will be reflected in the life of the dreamer. In addition, the revelations and events that the dreamer narrates when they came to the dream. Interpretation of a dream about dancing at a wedding in a dream In general, interpretive scholars have argued that dancing in a dream is one of the rejected things and is classified as one of the unpleasant dreams, as it carries a bad omen for people and can be Good news according to the connotations and suggestions that are. Present in the dream and we give you some interpretations: Dancing in a dream is generally considered something undesirable or unpleasant. The reason for this is that it is a sign that the dreamer will soon face many problems and fears. In addition, the viewer can be shocked by the many things that He will be exposed to it, which will cause him to lose his balance. We find that the interpretation of a dream about dancing varies depending on the context of the dream. In this case, the dreamer sees himself dancing in one of the homes of his relatives or acquaintances, and this indicates that this house will be exposed to their problems and worries and that he will share their sadness and anxiety. It is noteworthy that In this case, he sees himself dancing in his home and among his family, as this indicates a happy vision, goodness, and happiness that will happen to the people of the house in the near future. Also, the interpretation of the dream of dancing at a wedding varies according to the state in which the dreamer is, and that is in this case if he is sick and sees himself dancing. At a wedding, this is an indication that a period of illness. It will extend, and God knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a white snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about dancing at a wedding by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that a dream about dancing at a wedding is an unpleasant dream and that it carries a bad omen for the dreamer, in addition to its variation according to the social status of the viewer, and we present You have some of these dreams. , including: It may indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to trials and tribulations in his real life, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision indicates that the dreamer will soon be exposed to difficult financial circumstances or a major deterioration in his health. Aside from the person himself, if he dreams of dancing in front of women, This indicates that he will expose himself to scandal in front of people and reveal his cover, so he will turn to God, asking Him to cover him and not expose him. And God Almighty knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about dancing at a wedding for a single girl. There is no doubt that a dream about dancing in general carries several different interpretations, as it could be a bad omen for the monarch, or it could be good news for him and his life, and among these interpretations: we find that if he sees... The dreamer is an unmarried woman dancing in a dream, this means that she will be exposed to many things that will cause her worry, worry, and sadness in real life. In addition, if an unmarried woman sees herself in a dream dancing at a wedding, this means that she will be exposed to a scandal in front of people, So it should

There is no doubt that a dream about dancing in general carries several different interpretations, as it could be a bad omen for the monarch, or it could be good news for him and his life, and among these interpretations: we find that if he sees... The dreamer is an unmarried woman dancing in a dream, this means that she will be exposed to many things that will cause her worry, worry, and sadness in real life. In addition, if an unmarried woman sees herself in a dream dancing at a wedding, this means that she will be exposed to a scandal in front of people, So it should

title: Interpretation of seeing the death of a neighbor in a dream and what it indicates

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the death of a neighbor in a dream: A neighbor is a person who lives next to a person. The neighbor can be a relative or a stranger, and he must treat the neighbor well. God Almighty mentioned the neighbor in the Qur’an and commanded him as the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, commanded him, and seeing him in a dream means good relations, friendship, and the satisfaction of desires. As the vision indicates getting rid of troubles and troubles. Interpretation of a dream about a neighbor’s death and crying over him for free. Interpretation of a dream about a neighbor’s death and a girl crying over him, and this person was really real, and this is evidence that almost relieves death and anxiety and gets rid of problems. And if an unmarried woman sees the death of one of her relatives while she is alive Life, the vision is very good, and indicates victory over enemies and the fulfillment of desires. If a girl sees in her dream that her father is dying, or he died in the dream, this indicates the father’s long life and repentance from sins, and this vision for the girl is good. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a neighbor, which is Alive in a man’s dream. Interpretation of dreams about the death of a neighbor while he is alive. The vision was good for the man or young man and indicates good luck and the death of worry and worry for the pioneer and close to comfort. Seeing the death of a relative of the monarch or the death of the neighbor while he is alive indicates an improvement in the financial situation of the lord. And repentance from sins. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person from the family. If one sees in a dream the death of one of his relatives or someone from the family and he is in fact alive, then the vision indicates the long life of that person, and seeing a living person dying and then returning to life may indicate committing sins. And disobeying the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a neighbor in a married woman’s dream. Seeing the death of a confused woman in a married woman’s dream may indicate the end of worry and worry and an improvement in the woman’s financial situation. When a girl sees in her dream that her fiancé is dying or dying, this is a good sign that the woman’s financial situation is approaching. The date of her move to the marital home. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person for an unmarried girl indicates the imminent relief and the death of anxiety and sadness from the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a neighbor in a divorced woman’s dream When a divorced woman sees in her dream that her neighbor died and she was really alive, this means that she will achieve what she wants Her tension and anxiety will disappear and soon relief will also appear. If she sees that her neighbor died while he was alive and then died again, the vision may indicate exposure to judgments and adversity, and committing sins and disobedience. Seeing the death of a relative indicates that her life will change for the better, and if she sees that she died in... Her dream means that she will be exposed to hardships, pain, and the death of someone. Of relatives indicates victory over enemies. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a person: A living person dying in a dream indicates the approaching date of the dreamer’s wedding, whether he is a young man or a girl, and seeing the death of a person in a dream, but he is alive in reality. It means success and success for the fortuneteller and the fulfillment of his desires. For a man to see that someone he knows is alive and has died may indicate success and success in professional life and the student will achieve success and success in studies. title: What is the interpretation of a car accident in a dream for senior scholars?

preview.html: A car accident in a dream: The appearance of a car in a dream confirms a group of things that require joy and optimism, if the dreamer sees the new car or its different colors, as each color indicates a specific topic, but unfortunately a car accident is bad if the sleeper is exposed to it in his dream, and the meaning varies from one man to another. Woman Therefore, we would like to interpret a car accident in a dream, so follow us. Car accident in a dream If you see in a dream that you are driving a car and you are driving it in a good way, but a bad surprise occurred and the car was subjected to a strong collision, then the dream is interpreted through some negative emotions that affect you. As a result of experiencing severe sadness after rest and stability, which means that there are bad events that will surprise you, God forbid. If the dreamer was exposed to a severe car accident during his dream and it caused serious damage or death in his vision, then the meaning is to highlight a great evil that appears in his life and strong machinations may conspire around him. He will suffer great destruction because of it in the coming time. A car accident in a dream by Laban Sirin. A car accident in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, symbolizes surprises and various things that begin to appear in reality, but unfortunately most of them are negative and bad for the pioneer and he faces problems and conflicts with his family or friends. The stronger and more influential the accident is. On the person, the more difficult the interpretation is, and the meaning may be related to many emotional tensions between the sleeper and his wife or fiancée, and this is the case if the car falls into the sea or river and he drowns in it. The car accident in a dream by Al-OsaimiImam Al-Osaimi proves that seeing a car accident in a dream is very disturbing, which is what Interpreted in an unfavorable way, whether for a man or a woman, and it can indicate the end of the emotional relationship that the person is going through during the present period, and thus the psychological conditions turn into a harmful and disturbing state for the sleeper. As for a married woman, when she and her husband are exposed to a major traffic accident, It can be said that there are bad events and unsatisfactory news that will separate them soon and it may be related to children or family, and thus there will be serious harm to those in real life, God forbid. Enter the online Dream Interpretation website from Google and search for all the interpretations you are looking for. A car accident in a dream for single people. When a girl is in a happy romantic relationship and is close to the person she is in a relationship with, and she witnesses a car accident in her dream, she must be more careful in this relationship because she may lose her fiancé. Sometimes a girl is very interested in her studies and is afraid that something bad will happen to her during it, and it can be considered an accident. The car is an indication of damage to one's studies and the passage of many pains and negative issues. Which affects her academic level and puts her in a bad position after she excelled and excelled. A car accident in a dream for married people. Interpretation scholars are not optimistic about the appearance of a car accident in a woman’s dream and confirm that it is a sign of extreme tension and her feeling of inability to make one of the important decisions regarding her children or her husband’s life.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing winter in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing winter in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi. The dream of seeing winter in a dream is one of the visions that express a lot of goodness, and death from worry and anxiety, and seeing winter in a dream indicates positive changes for the pioneer and very good for the pioneer. Since it indicates rest after fatigue and suffering and the satisfaction of desires, we will give you the complete interpretation of the dream of seeing winter in a dream. Follow us. The dream of seeing winter by Ibn Sirin. The dream of winter, as interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin, is evidence of the abundance of goodness for the forerunner. Winter for the dreamer also shows piety and faith. It is considered Seeing autumn and winter in the summer is a sign of the diseases that afflict the country. To see that winter has destroyed the land, this dream showed a lot of pain to people. A dream of seeing winter by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing light rain in a dream is evidence of goodness and blessings. As for heavy rain In a dream, which causes heavy rain to fall, this is a sign of sadness and sorrow. Thus, seeing rain falling in a dream indicates the coming of goodness. Dreaming of seeing winter in a sick person’s dream is evidence of his recovery from illness. Whoever bathes in winter in a dream shows strength. His faith and religion. I dream of seeing winter for Nabulsi. Winter, as the Nabulsi researcher interprets it in a dream, is a sign of the good that the dreamer will receive in his life. As for the blood that came down from the sky, it is evidence of many sins and transgressions. Likewise, if the dreamer sees rain reviving something that is dying, This is evidence of goodness and blessing. Seeing rain indicates weakness. Therefore, seeing trees uprooted by rain is evidence of conflict between people. Seeing a dreamer drinking clear rain water is evidence that he will improve, while drinking cloudy rain water is a sign of illness. As for seeing honey Or mistletoe falling from the sky, it is evidence of the goodness and blessing that has befallen the people of the earth. Seeing heavy rain falling in a certain place is a sign of neglect and sadness on the part of the monarch. Dreaming of seeing winter for single women. Seeing winter for unmarried women means good luck, success, and good luck in her life. The dream interpretation of seeing winter in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates marriage or graduation from school. Some scholars explained that seeing winter in a dream is a sign of a chivalrous and pious husband. Winter in a dream indicates good deeds and avoiding taboos, but if one sees that winter is coming in the summer In a dream, this may indicate the changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life. If an unmarried woman sees this vision, this is evidence that she will obtain what she desires and will rest and calm down. The vision also indicates the approaching marriage of a meek and religious young man, and seeing the interpretation of rain and thunder indicates the necessity of feeling With safety and comfort after fatigue and suffering. It also represents a new life. Seeing a rainy winter for a girl is approaching her wedding. Seeing thunder and lightning indicates suffering and distress. But seeing lightning accompanied by rain means very good, happiness and stability. Winter also indicates the fulfillment of long-held desires.

title: Interpretation of dreams: Hearing the call to prayer in a dream...sins and marriage

preview.html: Hearing the call to prayer in a dream is a good vision that carries many meanings. Scientists and dream interpreters believe that the sound of the call to prayer in a patient’s dream is almost a sign of healing. Fajr prayer calls for immediate justice and turning to God for good deeds. It is not good to listen to the call to prayer while sleeping, because this indicates a bad reputation and being far from the truth. In a married woman’s dream, the call to prayer indicates a blessing in her husband’s money and an imminent pregnancy. It may herald a man of high standing at work and earning a lawful livelihood. Therefore, we show you in this article everything related to seeing a call in a dream for men and women in detail. Interpretation of a dream about geese in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. The sound of the call to prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that the sound of the call to prayer in a dream indicates closeness to God and repentance from sins. Also The loud sound of the call to prayer in a dream will get rid of major sins and provide a source of halal food that the dreamer heralds. If the dreamer hears the sound of the call to prayer in a dream, this indicates the fulfillment of distant desires and dreams that will be announced and their legal power. The call to prayer on the graves of the dead in a dream is good for a conclusion and for good deeds. Which the dreamer requests. If a man sees himself giving permission to the pulpit in a dream, this indicates a high position at work and promotion through which he earns a lot of money. An evening invitation in a dream has a good reputation, good character and religion. Interpretation of a dream about thunder in a dream in detail. Hearing the call to prayer in a dream A woman's sleep: The sound of the call to prayer in an unmarried girl's dream is evidence of the fulfillment of difficult desires and the fulfillment of all the distant dreams that she desires. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is giving the call to prayer on the pulpit, this indicates a prestigious position at work. A person's prayer when hearing the call to prayer in a dream is good news to go To the Sacred House of God and perform the rituals of Hajj and Umrah. Hearing the call to prayer in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of an abundance of money and legal livelihood, and this vision may warn her of a close marriage to a well-off person. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its meaning in detail. The call to prayer in a pregnant and married woman’s dreamVoice The call to prayer in a married woman’s dream is evidence of closeness to her husband and the good feelings that unite them. If a married woman hears the call to prayer in her dream, this indicates the nearness of pregnancy and the birth of good offspring and religion. While the sound of the call in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the approaching birth and the ease of childbirth. The low call to prayer in a dream does not deserve praise, which warns the dreamer of many sins committed against God Almighty and straying from the path of truth. Interpretation of a dream about planets in a dream. The call to prayer in a dream for single and married people. The sound of the call to prayer in a married man’s dream brings good feelings between him and his wife. It also The call to prayer in a bachelor’s dream is a close marriage with a girl of good character and religion. Hearing the call to prayer loudly in a dream is a good vision that reflects a stable psychological state, kindness, and halal food. The call to prayer in a merchant’s dream is considered a successful act and an overcoming of adversities and crises that a person experiences in his work. Interpretation Solution

title: Interpretation of the pen in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The pen is mentioned in the book “Interpretation of Dreams,” attributed to Sheikh Ibn Shirin, in the forty-fifth chapter, which is a chapter dedicated to the interpretation of writing, ink, paper, writing, and poetry. Where Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of a dream about a pen: The pen in a dream refers to what reminds the person with whom decisions are implemented or because of him, and it is a symbol of the ruler, authority, the world, language, as well as the sword and the male child. The ink or ink in the interpretation is the power of a person and can indicate his seed and planting. In interpretation, the pen refers to truth and justice, and writing with a pen indicates an increase in vision or insight, which is the believer’s awareness and hopes when awake. It is said in interpretation: The pen in dreams indicates knowledge, so whoever sees in his dream that he is tapping with a pen will benefit from knowledge that matches what he saw in the dream. His dream, as if he was writing, scribbling, recording, or recording it. It was said: The pen in a dream indicates sponsorship or sponsorship, as God Almighty said in Surat Al-Imran, verse (44): It is said in this context of interpretation: That a man said to Ibn Sirin: I saw that I was sitting next to a pen, so I took it and began to write with it, and I saw another pen to my right, So he took and wrote both together. The man said yes. Ibn Shirin said: It is as if the absent person returns to you. And perhaps this man was a long lost boy. If a writer sees in his dream that he is holding a pen in his right hand or an inkwell, then he is safe from poverty because of his art. The barber who holds the scissors, or the butcher who holds the knife, or the carpenter who holds... The saw. The sharpener with which a pen is sharpened in a dream may indicate a good daughter or a jealous son, because in interpretation it is equivalent to a knife and all sharp tools. The pen in interpretation is a command and prohibition or a commandment, and it was also said: The pen is the head of laws and laws. The pen in dreams indicates a son. Or the writer, the legislator, or the judge. It is related in this part of the interpretation: that a man dreamed that he had acquired a pen, and this dream was narrated in a clip, and he was told: A son (boy) will be born to you and he will learn goodness. Knowing what will benefit his people or nation. Source: From the book Interpretation of Great Dreams by Ibn Sirin. Dawa: A glass bottle in which the pen and ink are placed, i.e. an inkwell.

Or the writer, the legislator, or the judge. It is related in this part of the interpretation: that a man dreamed that he had acquired a pen, and this dream was narrated in a clip, and he was told: A son (boy) will be born to you and he will learn goodness. Knowing what will benefit his people or nation. Source: From the book Interpretation of Great Dreams by Ibn Sirin. Dawa: A glass bottle in which the pen and ink are placed, i.e. an inkwell.
